title: Why isn't IDA Freeware using my .idt file?
content:
I'm trying to learn my way around IDA and using the IDA Free package. I've been trying to analyse a program that imports mfc140 which IDA Free doesn't ship signatures for.

I've loaded the .dll myself and used a small script to generate a .idt file which as far as I can tell is OK. However, when I load the IDT using the File -> Load File -> IDS/IDT File... dialog nothing happens.

I'm not entirely sure what I've gotten wrong here.

Heres a small sample of the program with the imports: 

.idata:0000000140019618 ; __int64 __fastcall mfc140_265(_QWORD, _QWORD, _QWORD)
.idata:0000000140019618                 extrn __imp_mfc140_265:qword
.idata:0000000140019618                                         ; DATA XREF: mfc140_265↑r
.idata:0000000140019618                                         ; Import by ordinal 265
.idata:0000000140019620                 extrn __imp_mfc140_266:qword
.idata:0000000140019620                                         ; DATA XREF: mfc140_266↑r
.idata:0000000140019620                                         ; Import by ordinal 266
.idata:0000000140019628                 extrn mfc140_1639:qword ; CODE XREF: sub_140016210+9D↑p
.idata:0000000140019628                                         ; sub_1400165D0+3B↑p
.idata:0000000140019628                                         ; DATA XREF: ...
.idata:0000000140019628                                         ; Import by ordinal 1639
.idata:0000000140019630                 extrn mfc140_4937:qword ; CODE XREF: sub_140016340+38↑p
.idata:0000000140019630                                         ; sub_140016660+32↑p
.idata:0000000140019630                                         ; DATA XREF: ...
.idata:0000000140019630                                         ; Import by ordinal 4937
.idata:0000000140019638                 extrn mfc140_5656:qword ; CODE XREF: sub_140016210+72↑p
.idata:0000000140019638                                         ; sub_140016340+2D↑p ...
.idata:0000000140019638                                         ; Import by ordinal 5656
.idata:0000000140019640                 extrn mfc140_316:qword  ; CODE XREF: sub_140016070+2C↑p
.idata:0000000140019640                                         ; sub_140016070+37↑p
.idata:0000000140019640                                         ; DATA XREF: ...
.idata:0000000140019640                                         ; Import by ordinal 316
.idata:0000000140019648                 extrn mfc140_300:qword  ; CODE XREF: sub_1400161E0+20↑p
.idata:0000000140019648                                         ; DATA XREF: sub_1400161E0+20↑r
.idata:0000000140019648                                         ; Import by ordinal 300
.idata:0000000140019650                 extrn mfc140_310:qword  ; CODE XREF: sub_140001030+1B↑p
.idata:0000000140019650                                         ; sub_140001070+1B↑p ...
.idata:0000000140019650                                         ; Import by ordinal 310
